feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
